achievements.name: Welcome to the Rice Fields
achievements.description: Finish a round on any map as the North Vietnamese forces.

achievements.name: FNG
achievements.description: Finish a round on any map as the US forces.

achievements.name: Tripwire, Interactive
achievements.description: Kill an enemy player with a tripwire trap.

achievements.name: It's a Trap!
achievements.description: Step on an enemy's punji trap.

achievements.name: Smells Like... Victory!
achievements.description: Get 10 kills with a single napalm strike.

achievements.name: Hoist By Your Own Petard
achievements.description: Destroy a Helicopter as North Vietnamese with a stolen M79 Grenade Launcher.

achievements.name: A Real Hot Behind
achievements.description: Kill an enemy with the RPG's back-blast.

achievements.name: I Ain't Got Time To Bleed!
achievements.description: Kill an enemy whilst you are bleeding.

achievements.name: Whatever Happened to Leon Trotsky?
achievements.description: Kill an enemy with the pick mattock.

achievements.name: White Feather
achievements.description: Kill an enemy from over 250m away with the XM21 Sniper Rifle.

achievements.name: The Smell of Napalm in the Morning
achievements.description: Kill the North Vietnamese commander with napalm.

achievements.name: Thumper
achievements.description: Kill an enemy with an unexploded M79 shell.

achievements.name: Survive!
achievements.description: Use two bandages in one life without dying.

achievements.name: Back For More
achievements.description: Refill an out-of-ammo primary weapon at a Resupply Point.

achievements.name: Shave...
achievements.description: Kill an enemy with a helicopter's tail rotor blade.

achievements.name: ... and a Haircut
achievements.description: Kill an enemy with a helicopter's main rotor blade.

achievements.name: Pancake
achievements.description: Kill an enemy by landing a helicopter on them.

achievements.name: First Blood
achievements.description: Get the first kill in a round.

achievements.name: First Blood: Part 2
achievements.description: Get the second kill in a round.

achievements.name: Help is on the Way!
achievements.description: Reopen your team's spawn window in Skirmish mode by capturing an objective as the last man standing.

achievements.name: The Gang Solves the North Vietnam Situation
achievements.description: Finish a game as part of the top-scoring squad in the game.

achievements.name: Surprise, Mother...!
achievements.description: As the VC/PAVN Commander, spawn 8 or more friendly soldiers on your position in a single use of the Ambush ability.

achievements.name: Slugfest
achievements.description: Kill 7 enemies with shotgun slugs in a single life.

achievements.name: One Shot, One Kill
achievements.description: Using the Mosin Nagant (non-sniper), get one kill for every shot fired from a single five round clip.

achievements.name: Edge of a Straight Razor
achievements.description: Complete the capture of an objective as the only player in it, in any mode.

achievements.name: What Goes Around...
achievements.description: Kill an enemy North Vietnamese soldier by shooting a booby trap to detonate it.

achievements.name: Charlie Don't Surf!
achievements.description: Kill a North Vietnamese soldier while they are standing in water.

achievements.name: Triggernometry
achievements.description: Shoot down an enemy support aircraft with an RPG.

achievements.name: No Strings Attached
achievements.description: Get a kill with a tripwire trap that hasn't had its second stake planted yet.

achievements.name: Trick Shot
achievements.description: Kill an enemy player with a crashing aircraft that you shot down.

achievements.name: Unlucky
achievements.description: Be killed by a crashing aircraft that has been shot down.

achievements.name: Tunnel Rat
achievements.description: As a member of the US forces, kill 5 enemies in a single life while inside a North Vietnamese tunnel.

achievements.name: Daisy Chain
achievements.description: Kill an enemy with an MD82 mine that was detonated by another MD82's explosion.

achievements.name: Purple Haze
achievements.description: Mark a target with purple smoke that is then bombarded and kills an enemy player.

achievements.name: Look Out Below!
achievements.description: Be killed by enemy artillery whilst in a helicopter.

achievements.name: Lead Farmer
achievements.description: Fire every round of an LMG's starting ammo in a single life.

achievements.name: Oh Baby, a Double!
achievements.description: Kill two enemies with a single round from a non-explosive weapon.

achievements.name: Walls Can't Save You Now!
achievements.description: Kill an enemy with an RPG-7 through a wall or other piece of cover.

achievements.name: Blowin' in the Wind
achievements.description: Safely land a helicopter (using autorotation) after the engine dies at greater than 50m altitude.

achievements.name: We Just Put Sir Isaac Newton in the Driver's Seat
achievements.description: Survive a helicopter crash with two dead pilots or a destroyed main rotor.

achievements.name: The Horror...
achievements.description: Witness another player dying from napalm up close, while surviving yourself.

achievements.name: Up Close and Personal
achievements.description: Kill 5 enemies using a bayonet.

achievements.name: Iron Thighs
achievements.description: Spend a total of two hours crouched.

achievements.name: Green Belly
achievements.description: Spend a total of two hours prone.

achievements.name: Ain't No Hurdle High Enough
achievements.description: Mantle 500 times.

achievements.name: Puff the Magic Dragon
achievements.description: Get 50 kills with the AC47 gunship.

achievements.name: Die Walkure
achievements.description: Insert 25 soldiers into combat from the Huey.

achievements.name: Rider on the Storm
achievements.description: Spawn 10 times in the back of a helicopter.

achievements.name: Spitting Cobra
achievements.description: Get 50 kills with the Cobra's chin turret.

achievements.name: It Belongs in a Museum!
achievements.description: Get 10 kills with the Mosin Nagant (non-sniper).

achievements.name: The Value of Not Being Seen
achievements.description: Use camouflage to hide from recon planes for a total of 5 minutes.

achievements.name: Get Some!
achievements.description: Get 25 kills as a helicopter door-gunner.

achievements.name: Rookie Soldier
achievements.description: Kill 100 Enemy Infantry.

achievements.name: Veteran Soldier
achievements.description: Kill 500 Enemy Infantry.

achievements.name: Master Soldier
achievements.description: Kill 1000 Enemy Infantry.

achievements.name: Machinegunner Rookie
achievements.description: Kill 50 Enemies with LMGs.

achievements.name: Machinegunner Veteran
achievements.description: Kill 250 Enemies with LMGs.

achievements.name: Machinegunner Master
achievements.description: Kill 500 Enemies with LMGs.

achievements.name: Sharpshooter Rookie
achievements.description: Kill 50 Enemies with Sniper Rifles.

achievements.name: Sharpshooter Veteran
achievements.description: Kill 100 Enemies with Sniper Rifles.

achievements.name: Sharpshooter Master
achievements.description: Kill 250 Enemies with Sniper Rifles.

achievements.name: Hand-to-Hand Rookie
achievements.description: Get 10 Melee Kills.

achievements.name: Hand-to-Hand Veteran
achievements.description: Get 50 Melee Kills.

achievements.name: Hand-to-Hand Master
achievements.description: Get 100 Melee Kills.

achievements.name: Teamwork!
achievements.description: Get 25 Kill Assists.

achievements.name: Duck Hunting Rookie
achievements.description: Destroy 5 Enemy Helicopters.

achievements.name: Duck Hunting Veteran
achievements.description: Destroy 50 Enemy Helicopters.

achievements.name: Duck Hunting Master
achievements.description: Destroy 100 Enemy Helicopters.

achievements.name: A Winner is You! - Rookie
achievements.description: Win a total of 10 rounds, regardless of map or gamemode.

achievements.name: A Winner is You! - Veteran
achievements.description: Win a total of 50 rounds, regardless of map or gamemode.

achievements.name: A Winner is You! - Master
achievements.description: Win a total of 100 rounds, regardless of map or gamemode.

achievements.name: Territories Rookie
achievements.description: Win 10 Rounds of Territories.

achievements.name: Territories Veteran
achievements.description: Win 50 Rounds of Territories.

achievements.name: Territories Master
achievements.description: Win 100 Rounds of Territories.

achievements.name: Skirmish Rookie
achievements.description: Win 10 Rounds of Skirmish.

achievements.name: Skirmish Veteran
achievements.description: Win 50 Rounds of Skirmish.

achievements.name: Skirmish Master
achievements.description: Win 100 Rounds of Skirmish.

achievements.name: Supremacy Rookie
achievements.description: Win 10 Rounds of Supremacy.

achievements.name: Supremacy Veteran
achievements.description: Win 50 Rounds of Supremacy.

achievements.name: Supremacy Master
achievements.description: Win 100 Rounds of Supremacy.

achievements.name: Run Through the Jungle
achievements.description: Sprint for a total of 10km.

achievements.name: Crouch Run Through the Jungle
achievements.description: Sprint while crouched for a total of 10km.

achievements.name: High Five!
achievements.description: Get 5 kills with punji traps.

achievements.name: Demolition Man
achievements.description: Collapse 25 enemy spawn tunnels.

achievements.name: What a Thrill.
achievements.description: Spend a total of 2 minutes climbing ladders.

achievements.name: I Come From a Land Down Under
achievements.description: Finish a round on any map as the Australian forces.

achievements.name: That's Not a Knife... THAT'S a Knife
achievements.description: Bayonet a player who is mid-bayonet charge on an Australian forces map (as either team).

achievements.name: That's Not a Knife, That's a Spoon!
achievements.description: Kill a player who has a bayonet equipped, using melee WITHOUT a bayonet equipped, on an Australian forces map (as either team).

achievements.name: He Was Only Nineteen
achievements.description: Kill an Australian soldier.

achievements.name: Bluey
achievements.description: Complete a round as an Australian soldier with red hair.

achievements.name: We're the Only Diggers Around Here!
achievements.description: As an Australian soldier, kill a North Vietnamese soldier who is in the process of digging a spawn tunnel.

achievements.name: Ned Kelly
achievements.description: Kill 100 enemy soldiers as the pilot of the Bushranger.

achievements.name: Captain Thunderbolt
achievements.description: Kill 50 enemy soldiers as the gunner of the Bushranger.

achievements.name: XXXX
achievements.description: Spot 4 enemies in a single life as an Australian soldier.

achievements.name: Master Blaster
achievements.description: Who runs Bartertown?! As an Australian soldier, kill an enemy with a stolen RPG.

achievements.name: Two Men Enter, One Man Leaves
achievements.description: Safely land and exit a bushranger with a dead pilot or co-pilot (as either pilot or copilot).

achievements.name: BOOMerang
achievements.description: Throw a grenade, get blown up by it. (As an Australian soldier)

achievements.name: High Ping Killer
achievements.description: Reload the M1 Garand 250 times.

achievements.name: ARVN a Good Time
achievements.description: Complete a round playing as the Army of the Republic of Vietnam.

achievements.name: Raising the BAR
achievements.description: Get 100 kills with the M1918 Browning Automatic Rifle.

achievements.name: Miss Saigon
achievements.description: Near-miss (suppress) 8 enemies without hitting anyone, with a single shot from the M1D Garand sniper rifle.

achievements.name: Quang Trifecta
achievements.description: Win three rounds on VNSU-Quang Tri.

achievements.name: Unlucky Number
achievements.description: Be the fourth ARVN soldier killed in a round.

achievements.name: A Sau Loser
achievements.description: Lose a round on A Sau.

achievements.name: A Flare For the Dramatic
achievements.description: Win a round on A Sau.

achievements.name: The Untouchables
achievements.description: Get ten kills with the M1A1 Thompson without taking damage.

achievements.name: A Spad Time
achievements.description: Shoot down the Skyraider with an RPG.

achievements.name: Rewriting the History Books
achievements.description: Win a campaign as the South Vietnamese forces.

achievements.name: Home Status: Safe
achievements.description: Win campaign as the North Vietnamese forces.

achievements.name: Ho Chi Winh
achievements.description: Win a round as the North Vietnamese forces with the Ho Chi Minh Trail ability active.

achievements.name: Kill 'Em All
achievements.description: Win a round as the South Vietnamese forces with the Search & Destroy ability active.

achievements.name: Richard Nixon, War Hero
achievements.description: Win a Campaign as the South Vietnamese forces before the end of 1975.

achievements.name: Domino Theory
achievements.description: Win a Campaign as the North Vietnamese forces before the end of 1975.

achievements.name: Joy to the World
achievements.description: Win a match on the 'Green Army Men Christmas' event map.

achievements.name: I'm on Santa's Naughty List
achievements.description: Lose a match on the 'Green Army Men Christmas' event map.

achievements.name: Look Mom, I'm on TV!
achievements.description: You'll get square eyes if you sit that close!

achievements.name: What a Block Head
achievements.description: We'd also have settled for 'block party'.

achievements.name: Time to Play Santa
achievements.description: Pilot a helicopter for the first time on the 'Green Army Men Christmas' event map.

achievements.name: Couch Potato
achievements.description: What's a holiday without lazing around on the couch?

achievements.name: Is That Big Ben?
achievements.description: Time flies when you're having fun!

achievements.name: Rudolph Won't You Guide my Sleigh...
achievements.description: Twas the flight before Christmas...

achievements.name: Chestnuts Roasting on an Open Fire
achievements.description: Burn two enemies with the Flamethrower without releasing the trigger on the 'Green Army Men Christmas' event map.

achievements.name: Rockin' Around the Christmas Tree
achievements.description: Successfuly defend the 'Christmas Tree' objective on the 'Green Army Men Christmas' event map.

achievements.name: Christmas Sleigh
achievements.description: Kill five players in one lifetime on the 'Green Army Men Christmas' event map.

achievements.name: Ghost of Christmas Past
achievements.description: Now how did that get up here?
